    • Method Detail

      • connectBack

        public void connectBack(IUser userStub)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: IUser
        This method will give back its local IUser stub to the remote user being connected to. It supports an "auto-connect-back" feature wherein an accepted request to chat is automatically connected without the user having to know the requestor's address.
        Parameters:
        userStub - - The IUser stub being passed to the remote user object
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • receive

        public <S> void receive(OurDataPacket<? extends IUserMsg,S> dp)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: IUser
        Receive message (and then call msg.execute(algo) to process it) as a remote IUser stub.
        Parameters:
        dp - - A datapacket containing message that implements IUserMsg.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
